description: The patient additional demographic segment contains demographic information that is likely to change about the patient.

1.name: Living Dependency
1.description: This field identifies specific living conditions (e.g., spouse dependent on patient, walk-up) that are relevant to an evaluation of the patients healthcare needs. This information can be used for discharge planning. This field repeats because, for example, "spouse dependent" and "medical supervision required" can apply at the same time. Refer to User-defined Table 0223 - Living dependency for suggested values.
1.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

10.name: Duplicate Patient
10.description: This field indicates that a patient is the same as, or a duplicate of, another patient found on the sending system. The intent is to be informational only and no action is required by the receiver. Include the patient identifier if the sender knows an identifier for the patient. The assigning authority and identifier type code are strongly recommended for all CX data types.
10.data_type: CX - Extended Composite ID With Check Digit

11.name: Publicity Code
11.description: This field contains a user-defined code indicating what level of publicity is allowed (e.g., No Publicity, Family Only) for the patient. Refer to User-defined Table 0215 - Publicity code for suggested values. Refer to PV2-21 - Visit publicity code for visit level code.

12.name: Protection Indicator
12.description: This field identifies the patients protection that determines, in turn, whether access to information about this person should be kept from users who do not have adequate authority for the patient. Refer to HL7 Table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values. Refer to PV2-22 - Visit protection indicator for visit level code.
12.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

13.name: Protection Indicator Effective Date
13.description: This field indicates the effective date for PD1-12 - Protection Indicator .

14.name: Place of Worship
14.description: The patients place of worship. For example, the patient attends the First Baptist Church of Atlanta.
14.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name And Identification Number For Organizations

15.name: Advance Directive Code
15.description: This field indicates the patients instructions to the healthcare facility. Refer to User-defined Table 0435 - Advance directive code for suggested values. See also PV2-45 - Advance directive code .

16.name: Immunization Registry Status
16.description: This field identifies the registry status of the patient. The field may be used to indicate the changed status of a once active patient in a registry, such as an immunization registry. Refer to User-defined Table 0441 - Immunization registry status for suggested values.
16.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

17.name: Immunization Registry Status Effective Date
17.description: This field indicates the effective date for the registry status reported in PD1-16 - Immunization registry status.

18.name: Publicity Code Effective Date
18.description: This is the effective date for PD1-11 - Publicity Code.

19.name: Military Branch
19.description: This field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies. Refer to User-defined Table 0140 - Military service for suggested values.
19.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

2.name: Living Arrangement
2.description: This field identifies the situation in which the patient lives at his residential address. Examples might include Alone, Family, Relatives, Institution, etc. Refer to User-defined Table 0220 - Living arrangement for suggested values.
2.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

20.name: Military Rank/Grade
20.description: This user-defined field identifies the military rank/grade of the patient. Refer to User-defined Table 0141 - Military rank/grade for suggested values.
20.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

21.name: Military Status
21.description: This field is defined by HCFA or other regulatory agencies. Refer to User-defined Table 0142 - Military status for suggested values.
21.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

3.name: Patient Primary Facility
3.description: This field contains the name and identifier that specifies the "primary care" healthcare facility selected by the patient at the time of enrolment in an HMO Insurance Plan. Multiple names and identifiers are allowed for the same facility. The legal name of the healthcare facility must be sent in the first sequence. If the legal name of the facility is not sent, then the repeat delimiter must be sent in the first sequence. Refer to User-defined Table 0204 - Organizational name type for suggested values.
3.data_type: XON - Extended Composite Name And Identification Number For Organizations

4.name: Patient Primary Care Provider Name & ID No.
4.description: This field is retained for backward compatibility only. The ROL segment is now used to convey more complete information about the primary care provider. This field contained the provider name and ID of the primary care provider. Multiple names are allowed for the same person. The legal name must be sent in the first sequence. If the legal name is not sent, then the repeat delimiter must be sent in the first sequence.
4.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name For Persons

5.name: Student Indicator
5.description: This field indicates if the patient is currently a student or not, and whether the patient is a full-time or a part-time student. This field does not indicate the students degree level (high school, college, elementary) or the students field of study (accounting, engineering, etc.). Refer to User-defined Table 0231 - Student status for suggested values.
5.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

6.name: Handicap
6.description: This field indicates the nature of the patients permanent handicapped condition (e.g., deaf, blind). A handicapped condition is defined as a physical or mental disability that is permanent. Transient handicapped conditions should be sent in the ambulatory status. Refer to User-defined Table 0295 - Handicap for suggested values.
6.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

7.name: Living Will Code
7.description: This field indicates whether or not the patient has a living will and, if so, whether a copy of the living will is on file at the healthcare facility. If the patient does not have a living will, the value of this field indicates whether the patient was provided information on living wills. Refer to User-defined Table 0315 - Living will code for suggested values. See also PV2-43 - Living will code.
7.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

8.name: Organ Donor Code
8.description: This field indicates whether the patient wants to donate his/her organs and whether an organ donor card or similar documentation is on file with the healthcare organization. Refer to User-defined Table 0316 - Organ donor for suggested values. See also PV2-44 - Organ donor.
8.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

9.name: Separate Bill
9.description: This field specifies that charges for this patient are to be billed separately from other patient bills with the same guarantor. (This bill is now a patient bill rather than a guarantor bill.) Refer to HL7 Table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values.
9.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables
